import os, json, jmespath
from pyapacheatlas.core import AtlasEntity
from pyapacheatlas.core.util import GuidTracker
from pyapacheatlas.core import PurviewClient, AtlasEntity, AtlasProcess, TypeCategory
from pyapacheatlas.auth import ServicePrincipalAuthentication
from pyapacheatlas.core.typedef import AtlasAttributeDef, EntityTypeDef, RelationshipTypeDef
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType, ArrayType
from pyspark.sql.functions import explode, expr
from notebookutils import mssparkutils

# tenant_id = get_kv_secretvalue("KV-firstdf", "TenantId", "asfirstdf-WorkspaceDefaultSqlServer")

tenant_id = get_kv_secretvalue("lsKV", "TenantId")
client_id = get_kv_secretvalue("lsKV", "SpPurviewAppId")
client_secret = get_kv_secretvalue("lsKV", "SpPurviewKey")
purview_account_name = get_kv_secretvalue("lsKV", "PurviewAccountName")

oauth = ServicePrincipalAuthentication(
    tenant_id=os.environ.get("TENANT_ID", tenant_id),
    client_id=os.environ.get("CLIENT_ID", client_id),
    client_secret=os.environ.get("CLIENT_SECRET", client_secret),
)
client = PurviewClient(
    account_name=os.environ.get("PURVIEW_NAME", purview_account_name),
    authentication=oauth
)
guid = GuidTracker()
